descriptionMdByRank.1: When the Resonator's HP is above 80%, increases ATK by **12%**. When the Resonator's HP is below **40%**, restores their HP by **5%** for dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s.
